report.title: Filterable records by month
report.description: Counts records by month with standard params support.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(1,12) as months(no) left join (cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND o.date_start is not null #idlist# ) on date_part('month', o.date_start)=months.no
